entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is trying to protect herself from the crowd and her children's safety.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is taunting Molly, saying she will kill her children when she kills Molly.

entities.name: molly
entities.description: Molly is fighting against Bellatrix and Voldemort, trying to protect herself and her family.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is fighting against Molly and Bellatrix, trying to kill them.

entities.name: fred-die
entities.description: Fred-die is mentioned as someone who has been killed by Voldemort, making Molly sad and angry.

relationships.description: Mrs. Weasley is fighting against Bellatrix, trying to protect herself from her attacks.
Molly is fighting against Voldemort, trying to protect herself and her family.
Bellatrix is taunting Molly, saying she will kill her children when she kills Molly.
Voldemort killed Fred-die, making Molly sad and angry.
